contents.text: Welcome to Tech Liminal, your East Bay development agency offering programming, marketing, strategy, and a bit of fun.
To learn about our services, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our development team.

navigationGoals: Get a cost and timeline estimate for adding custom features to our internal software.
I need help developing a website for my veteran support group to handle volunteer sign-ups.
I’m evaluating your development stack—what languages and frameworks do you specialize in?
I need help updating my website’s content and adding new features, since I’m not very tech-savvy.
I’d like to explore developing a custom physics simulation web application.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to our marketing strategists.

navigationGoals: Discuss a plan to improve our social media outreach and lead generation.
I’m looking for marketing and strategy advice to promote my veteran-owned fitness coaching service.
I want to devise a data-driven SEO and content marketing strategy with A/B testing.
I want advice on promoting my small shop online and creating a basic marketing plan.
I need marketing strategy advice for promoting my physics research blog.

contents.text: To speak with our team, press 2.
If you are an existing client needing support, press 1.
One moment please, we’re connecting you to client support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a critical bug on our live platform as soon as possible.
I’m an existing client and need assistance fixing errors on my non-profit’s donation page.
I’m an existing client needing support to resolve an OAuth authentication bug in our app.
I’m an existing client and need help accessing my account and understanding my latest invoice.
I’m an existing client seeking support to troubleshoot a bug in my simulation code.

contents.text: For new project inquiries or consultations, press 2.
Thank you for your interest, please hold while we connect you to a project consultant.

navigationGoals: Schedule a consultation to evaluate building a new customer portal.
I’d like to discuss a new project: building a mobile app to connect veterans with local job opportunities.
I’d like to schedule a discovery call for a serverless IoT platform implementation.
I’d like to discuss starting a new website project for my community club and get a consultation.
I’d like a consultation to plan a new data visualization tool for my experiment.
